entities.description: The type of arrest recorded, such as On-View Arrest, Summoned/Cited, and Taken Into Custody.
Indicates whether the arrestee count is single or multiple.
Indicates if there are multiple segments for arrestees, specifying either single or multiple counts.
Data points that were not collected or are missing from the survey responses.

relationships.description: Links the arrest case to the type of arrest recorded.
Defines the number of arrestees involved in the case.
Indicates if there are multiple segments for arrestees in the arrest case.
Identifies data points that were not collected or are missing in the survey responses.
